effect.shortEffect: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 their max HP after each turn.
effect.full: Opposing Pokémon take 1/8 of their maximum HP in damage after each turn while they are asleep.

description.x-y: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
